response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. It is valued at $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and unique features. Considering its worth to you stands at $800,000, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a remarkable chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
